pages.text: or say, “If God has guided me I (too) would have been among those who guarded (against evil),”
or say at the time it sees the punishment, “Had there been a second chance for me (to go back to the world, then) I would be of those who do good.”
No, My signs had come to you but you denied them and you considered yourself great and you were among the disbelievers
And on the day of resurrection, you will see the faces of those who lied against God, (coloured) black. Is not the home of the proud in hell
And God will save those who guarded (against evil) because of their achievement, evil will not touch them nor will they grieve
God is the Creator of everything and He is a Trustee over everything
His are the keys of the skies and earth. And those who do not believe in the signs of God, those are the persons who are the losers
Say, “Then do you advise me to worship (something) other than God, O you ignorant people?”
And it has been communicated to you and those before you: If you associate partners (with God), your work will definitely become fruitless and you will definitely be among the losers
No, then serve God and be among those who are grateful

And they have not estimated God with the estimation due to Him. And the earth will be totally in His grip on the day of resurrection, with the skies rolled up in His right hand. Glorified is He and high (above) that which they associate as partners (with Him)
